analyzed: catuḥṣaṣṭi saṃvara stotram
śrī herukam mahā vīram viśuddham kuliśa īśvaram
namāmi sarva bhāvena ḍākinī gaṇa bhūṣitam
saṃvarāya namaḥ tubhyam dvaya ākārāya namaḥ namaḥ
cakra sthitāya devāya cakra saṃvara te namaḥ
meṣa vaktra namaḥ te tu śiva śakti svarūpiṇe
mahā krodha sva rūpāya meṣa saṃvara te namaḥ  /
aśva ānanāya devāya rati karma ratāya ca
bhukti mukti pradātre ca aśva saṃvara te namaḥ  /
vyāghra āsyāya namaḥ tubhyam śakti yuktāya vai namaḥ
surā māṃsa rataḥ nityam vyāghra saṃvara te namaḥ  /
kūrma āsyāya namaḥ tubhyam surate saṃratāya ca
namaḥ deva adhidevāya kūrma saṃvara te namaḥ  /
namāmi matsya vaktrāya mānavānām hitāya vai

original: namo namaste deveśa matsyasaṃvara te namaḥ || 7 ||
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ te deveśa matsya saṃvara te namaḥ  /
makara ākāra vaktrāya mahā śakti dharāya ca
manaḥ vāñchā pradātre ca makara saṃvara te namaḥ  /
saṃvarāya uṣṭra vaktrāya śaktika āliṅgaṇāya ca
maithune tatparāya atha uṣṭra saṃvara te namaḥ
namāmi gajavaktrāya yonau liṅga pradāya ca

original: namo bhagavate tubhyaṃ gajasaṃvara te namaḥ || 10 ||
analyzed: namaḥ bhagavate tubhyam gaja saṃvara te namaḥ  /
maṇḍūka ānana nāthāya trailokya īśāya te namaḥ
namaḥ deva adhidevāya maṇḍūka saṃvarāya ca
namāmi ca avivaktrāya nityam rati ratāya ca
namaḥ te devadeveśa ahi saṃvara te namaḥ  /
śuka ānanāya devāya dvaya ākāra ākāra śobhine

original: namo namaste bhīmāṅga śukasaṃvara te namaḥ || 13 ||
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ te bhīma aṅga śuka saṃvara te namaḥ  /
saṃvarāya namaḥ teḥ tu śakti yuktāya vai namaḥ

original: siṃhānanāya vai nityaṃ siṃhasaṃvara te namaḥ || 14 ||
analyzed: siṃha ānanāya vai nityam siṃha saṃvara te namaḥ  /
markaṭa ānana devāya śakti cumbana ratāya ca
namaḥ te astu namaḥ te astu hari saṃvara te namaḥ
śvāna vaktra namaḥ te tu śakti cumbana kāriṇe

original: namaste bhagavan deva śvānasaṃvara te namaḥ || 16 ||
analyzed: namaḥ te bhagavan deva śvānasaṃvara te namaḥ  /
namāmi śakti yuktāya ghṛṣṭi saṃvara te namaḥ  /
jambukāsyāya devāya śaktikāliṅgaṇāya ca
sarva pāpa harāya eva śiva asaṃvara te namaḥ  /
namāmi gṛdhra vaktrāya duḥkha nāśāya te namaḥ
dvaya ākāra siddhi devāya gṛdhra saṃvara te namaḥ  /
kākānanāya śuddha yakṣa śṛṅgāra rūpa dhāriṇe

original: namo bhagavate tubhyaṃ kākasaṃvara te namaḥ || 20 ||
analyzed: namaḥ bhagavate tubhyam kāka saṃvara te namaḥ  /
ulūka vaktriṇe tubhyam mahā saukhya pradāya ca
yoni maithuna kṛt deva ulūka saṃvara te namaḥ  /
tārkṣya ānanāya devāya tāriṇe bhava sāgarāt
namaḥ tubhyam namaḥ tubhyam namaḥ garuḍa saṃvara
go vaktrāya namaḥ tubhyam go hatyā pāpa hāriṇe
gotra vṛddhi pradātre ca dhenu saṃvara te namaḥ  /
gardabha ākāra vaktrāya gata āgata kṣayāya te
gaṇeśvarāya devāya khara saṃvara te namaḥ  /
mahiṣa āsyāya devāya mahāpralaya kāriṇe
śakti yuktāya devāya namaḥ mahiṣa saṃvara  /
viḍāla asya namaḥ tubhyam mūtrakūṇḍa prakrīḍine
śreṣṭhāya parameśāya namaḥ mārjāra saṃvara
namāmi śālva vaktrāya dvayaṅgam ekā iva śobhitam
namāmi devadeveśa namaḥ śarabha saṃvara
siddhāya siddha rūpāya guṇāya guṇa vartine
krauñca āsyāya namaḥ tubhyam krauñca saṃvara te namaḥ
ulkā ānanāya śuddhāya uttamāya namaḥ namaḥ
ugrāya bhīma rūpāya ulka saṃvara te namaḥ  /
haṃsa vaktra namaḥ te tu haṃsa svara svarūpiṇe
haṃsaḥ soham sva rūpāya haṃsa saṃvara te namaḥ  /
mṛga vaktrāya devāya namāmi parameśvara
ṛddhi siddhi pradātre ca mṛga saṃvara te namaḥ  /
śakti yukta namaḥ te tu cakravāka ānanāya ca
namaḥ te cakavāka ākhya saṃvarāya namaḥ namaḥ
a jānanāya vīrāya avidyā nāśine namaḥ
apavarga phala āpti artham aja saṃvara te namaḥ
kukkuṭa āsyāya devāya kula vṛddhi karāya ca
namaḥ te kauṭukeśāya tubhyam kukkuṭa saṃvara
kṛṣṇa sārasa vaktrāya namaḥ te karma sambhava
kālanāśāya devāya eṇasaṃvara te namaḥ  /
mūṣā ānanāya pūrṇāya jñāna dāya namaḥ namaḥ
sarva daitya vināśaya mūṣa saṃvara te namaḥ
namaḥ te tu māna ādi vara dāya ca
siddhi buddhi pradātre ca namaḥ sālūka saṃvara
namaḥ kapola vaktrāya prajñā upāya ātma rūpiṇe
namaḥ te astu mahāvīra kapota saṃvarāya ca
namāmi grāha vaktrāya bhukti mukti pradāya ca
namaḥ astu sarva bhūta īśa grāha saṃvara te namaḥ  /
namaḥ te cihla vaktrāya namaḥ te maithune rata

original: namaste bhagavan deva cihlasaṃvara te namaḥ || 40 ||
analyzed: namaḥ te bhagavan deva cihla saṃvara te namaḥ  /
caṭaka āsyāya devāya namaḥ te tu jagadguro
namaḥ te astu guṇa adhīśa caṭaka saṃvara te namaḥ  /
sārasa asya namaḥ tubhyam namaḥ te guṇa sāgara
namaḥ bhagavate tubhyam sārasa saṃvarāya ca
khañjanāsyāya devāya mahādevāya te namaḥ
nirvāṇa pada dātre khañjarīṭa saṃvarāya ca
namaḥ te kṣemakaryā asya bhukti mukti pradāya ca
namaḥ bhagavate deva kṣemakari saṃvarāya te  /
śaśaka asya namaḥ tubhyam namaḥ te bhuvaneśvara
karma pradāya te nityam namaḥ śaśaka saṃvara
namaḥ bhallūka vaktrāya rati krīḍā parāya ca
kārya siddhi pradātre ca namaḥ bhallūka saṃvara
pika āsyāya namaḥ tubhyam mantra siddhi karāya ca
triloka īśāya sarvāya pika saṃvara te namaḥ  /
namāmi vaka vaktrāya śakti yukta gaṇa adhipa
namāmi devadeveśa vakasaṃvara te namaḥ  /
khaṅgi vaktrāya devāya sarvadā śirasā namaḥ
namaḥ astu parameśāya khaṅgi saṃvara te namaḥ  /
karkaṭa asya namaḥ tubhyam namaḥ saṃsāra hetave
pāpa puñja vināśāya namaḥ karkaṭa saṃvara
namaḥ śallaki vaktrāya sarva doṣa nivāriṇe
saṃsāra pāśa nāśāya namaḥ śallaki saṃvara
vṛścika asya namaḥ tubhyam bala kalyāṇa dāya ca
namaḥ namaḥ te devāya namaḥ vṛścika saṃvara
ali vaktrāya devāya ali modāya te namaḥ
ali loka vināśāya ali saṃvara te namaḥ  /
jāhaka asya namaḥ te tu jana moha kṛtāya vai
jaya kalyāṇa dātre ca namaḥ jāhaka saṃvara
camarī vaktra te nityam cāturya phala dāyine
caturvarga pradātre ca namaḥ camari saṃvara
sīmni vaktra namaḥ tubhyam siddhi tva phala dāyine

original: namo bhagavate nityaṃ sīmnisaṃvara te namaḥ || 56 ||
analyzed: namaḥ bhagavate nityam sīmnisaṃvara te namaḥ  /
namāmi godha vaktrāya namaḥ te bhīma vikrama
namaḥ te divya netrāya godhā saṃvara te namaḥ  /
cakora asya namaḥ tubhyam cāñcalya doṣa nāśaka
namaḥ bhagavate tubhyam cakora saṃvarāya ca
godhika āsyāya satatam sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kariṇe
namaḥ te parama ānanda godhikā saṃvarāya ca
madhu mākṣika vaktrāya namaḥ te māna dāyaka
sarvajñāya para īśāya namaḥ mākṣika saṃvara

original: pataṅgavaktra te nityaṃ parameśa namaḥ sadā |
analyzed: pataṅga vaktra te nityam parameśa namaḥ sadā
divyāya divaseśāya namaḥ pataṅga saṃvara  /
nara vaktrāya devāya naraka dhnāya te namaḥ
nānā rūpa dadhānāya nara saṃvara te namaḥ
sṛṣṭi rūpa jagat dhāma sṛjate sarva bhūtakam

original: namo namaste satataṃ sṛṣṭisaṃvara te namaḥ || 63 ||
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ te satatam sṛṣṭi saṃvara te namaḥ  /
sthiti rūpāya devāya guṇāya guṇa vartine
namaḥ sāra vināśāya sthiti saṃvara te namaḥ  /
sarva lokasya saṃhāra kartre te parameśvara
tasmāt aham namasyāmi namaḥ pralaya saṃvara
jyotiḥ vaktra param dhāma namaḥ te jagat īśvara
parātparataram sūkṣma jyotiḥ saṃvara te namaḥ  /
iti idam saṃvara stotram triṣu lokeṣu durlabham
parātparataram stotram catuḥṣaṣṭi pramāṇakam
catuḥṣaṣṭi pramāṇeṣu ādyam ādyam tu vaktritam
bhūyas grantha mayāt ca atra ādya mātram pracoditam

original: kanyārthī labhate kanyāṃ dhanārthī labhate dhanam |
analyzed: kanyā arthī labhate kanyām dhana arthī labhate dhanam
vidyā arthī labhate vidyām mokṣa arthī mokṣam āpnuyāt
vaśīkaraṇam uccāṭam māra mohana stambhanam
ākarṣaṇam ca vidveṣam dhātuvādam rasāyanam
guṭikām pādukā siddhim khaṅga siddhim tathā eva ca
parakāyapraveśam ca dravya ākarṣaṇam eva ca
labhate stotrarājena satyam satyam mayā uditam
durbhikṣam ca āpadi pāṭham kurute śubham āpnuyāt
ati vṛṣṭau anāvṛṣṭau mahā mārī samudbhave
rājya bhraṃśe jñāna bhraṃśe strī bhraṃśe ca dhana kṣaye

original: kalahe ca vivāde ca paṭhate stotramuttamam || 74 ||
analyzed: kalahe ca vivāde ca paṭhate stotram uttamam
bhikṣukebhyaḥ sahasrebhyaḥ tulyam dāna kṛtam phalam
bahunā atra kim uktena brahmāṇḍa dāna jam phalam
śrī saṃvara āgame mahā tantre amitābha vairocana saṃvāde
śrī cakra saṃvara ādi catuḥṣaṣṭi saṃvara stotram samāptam
